short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension finds links on a page and groups them by extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever looked for a link on a website that is filled with adverts that look like the link you want? If so, this is the extension for you. It analyses the current web page and looks for links to user-defined file extensions (e.g. avi, jpg, mkv, torrent) and displays them, organized by file extension.
